meanings.definition: A person who pilots or operates a rocket.
meanings.sent1: The brave rocketeer guided the rocket into space.
meanings.sent2: The rocketeer launched the rocket successfully.
meanings.sent3: The rocketeer accidentally pressed the wrong button and ended up on the moon!
meanings.sent4: She was a rocketeer, navigating through life's challenges with precision.
meanings.sent5: The rocketeer's job is to soar through the sky like a shooting star.

meanings.definition: A member of a group or organization that designs or builds rockets.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated rocketeer worked tirelessly on the new rocket design.
meanings.sent2: The rocketeer team celebrated the successful launch of their latest creation.
meanings.sent3: The rocketeer group had a blast experimenting with different rocket materials.
meanings.sent4: He was a rocketeer in the world of innovation, always reaching for new heights.
meanings.sent5: The rocketeer's passion for rockets was evident in every detail of their work.
